result.name: Cloning of wheat leaf rust resistance gene LrLC10
result.description: Wheat leaf rust resistance gene LrLC10 is highly effective to leaf rust, we re-sequenced the parental lines (Liaochun10 and 7D49) to discover the variations (SNPs and indel) on the candidate region of LrLC10 and convert them to markers to fine map the gene. It started in 2017 and is based at wheat genetic and genome center.
